title: Ep. 22: 'The Watch' Re-up
description:
Chris and Andy give their five fleeting opinions for the weekend, zeroing in on the 'Better Call Saul' season premiere (6:00), 'New Girl' (14:00), reaction to the Grammys (19:30), giving 'Vinyl' another shot (29:50), and more music!
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
